channel.title: Data & Tracking on BEANCONQUEROR
channel.description: Recent content in Data & Tracking on BEANCONQUEROR

item.title: App Parameter
item.description: Weâ€™d like to continuously improve the app, the website and our future services for you. To do so, we need to track some data how you use the app and its features. You can check the Github Repository to see the actual code.

item.title: Matomo Parameter
item.description: We track the following basic parameters to understand the interaction with our website, the app and the pages that are used. Besides these parameters, we collect statistical information - most importantly, all these are anonymized. See all the details below:

item.title: Personal Data
item.description:
• We NEVER track your personal data, or any information which can lead to an identification of you as person.
  • As of now, we don’t use User-ID to identify and anonymize a unique user of the app.
